data.title: Art Gallery
data.text:
It holds an varied showing of artists work, most who are staples around the San Jose area. There is a large wall and adjoining space used for special exhibitions.

On Tuesdays it's Two Buck Tuesday and you can get some decent small art pieces for two dollars. Nice place to simply hang out with fellow artists on those Tuesdays.

data.title: Leisure
data.text: Drove up from Hollister to visit this gallery. Put money in the parking meter, at 12:10 pm-doors not open despite the hours being posted as opening at 12pm....

data.title: Awesome place
data.text: Very cool place with great stuff to see and buy, a wind of fresh air in the city. Main wall changes every once in a while and the rest once in 3 months.

data.title: Art Gallery in Downtown San Jose Area (by City Hall Area)
data.text:
We stopped by the art galleries in San Jose and stopped in to see Kaleid, an art gallery in San Jose downtown.

Kaleid has over 60 fine artists and designers who offer their works of art here for sell.   When we stopped here, we found the current collection "OK" but not "stellar".   Art for sell will vary so worth a stop if interested in art galleries.

The type of works for sell include painting, sculpture, photography, ceramics, glass, jewelry and textile art.   The artists range from emerging artists to well accomplished.

We found metered parking on the street by the gallery.  The location of Kaleid is about a one minute walk from the San Jose City Hall.

data.title: Love this gallery.
data.text: This is an excellent art gallery in downtown San Jose - with work by up and coming artists.  Prices are very reasonable for original works of art. Inexpensive prints are also available.  Our favorite artist there is Karen Carlo Salinger.
